<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1001. 温度转换 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1001" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">将输入的华氏温度转换为摄氏温度。由华氏温度F与摄氏温度C的转换公式为：F＝C&times;9/5＋32。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个实数，表示华氏温度</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应的摄氏温度，答案保留4位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>50</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>10.0000</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习2.4.1</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>

							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

ldd'>Firefox40.0绿色便携版.zip</a><br /><a class='solution' href='index.php/main/download/1001/%25E9%25A2%2598%25E8%25A7%25A3%2528C%2529WingFS.c/0/solution_path' data-toggle='tooltip' title='By 	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1001' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1001?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1001. \u6e29\u5ea6\u8f6c\u6362 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1004. 填充矩形 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1004" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">已知矩形的大小为n&times;m，现用a&times;a的正方形填充该矩形。输入三个正整数n,m,a（n,m,a&le;10^9），计算至多能填入多少正方形？（正方形可以正好碰到矩形边界，但不能超出矩形外）</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行三个用一个空格隔开的正整数n,m,a。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出能填入正方形的数量。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 4 1</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>12</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=n,m,a&le;10^9</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习2.6.1</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1004' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1004?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1004. \u586b\u5145\u77e9\u5f62 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1005. 存款收益 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1005" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">按年利率R%存入本钱X，存入P年后的本利合计为Y=X*((100+R)/100)^P，求Y的值。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一行三个空格隔开的实数R,X,P</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出收益Y，答案保留两位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1 100 5</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>105.10</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=X&lt;=10000<br />
1&lt;=P,R&lt;=100</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1005' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1005?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1005. \u5b58\u6b3e\u6536\u76ca (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1006. 捡石头 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1006" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">憨厚的老农夫昨天捡到了3块小石头，他想再去捡一个小石头,让这4个石头正好一共重20斤，请问他应该去捡一个多少斤的石头?</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">三个整数a,b,c,是这三个石头的重量(斤)</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一个数，表示农夫应该去捡一个多少斤的石头。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1006' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1006?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1006. \u6361\u77f3\u5934 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1007. 计算余数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1007" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">计算两个双精度浮点数a和b相除的余数，a和b都是正数。这里余数（r）的定义是：a = k * b + r，其中 k是整数， 0 &lt;= r &lt; b。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行两个空格隔开的数a和b。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出a除以b的余数(答案保留两位小数)。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 2</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1.00</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习2.6.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1007' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1007?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1007. \u8ba1\u7b97\u4f59\u6570 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1008. 水仙花数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1008" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入一个三位数n，判断是否为水仙花数，如果是则输出&ldquo;YES&rdquo;，不是则输出&ldquo;NO&rdquo;。水仙花数：是指一个3位数，它的每个位上的数字的3次幂之和等于它本身。（例如：1^3 + 5^3+ 3^3 = 153）</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个三位数n。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">按照题目描述输出对应结果。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>153</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>YES</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">100&lt;=n&lt;=999</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1009. 分配任务 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1009" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">在社会实践活动中有三项任务分别是：种树、采茶、送水。依据小组人数及男生、女生人数决定小组的接受任务，人数小于10人的小组负责送水（输出water），人数大于等于10人且男生多于女生的小组负责种树（输出tree），人数大于等于10人且男生不多于女生的小组负责采茶（输出tea）。输入小组男生人数、女生人数，输出小组接受的任务。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行两个空格隔开的数，表示小组中男生和女生的人数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应的任务。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>5 3</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>water</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.2.1</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>

							所有管理员添加的题目

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">
			<a class="btn" data-dismiss="modal">Close</a>
			<a class="btn btn-success" id="btn_upload">Upload</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1009' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1009?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1009. \u5206\u914d\u4efb\u52a1 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1010. 邮寄包裹 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1010" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">某邮局对邮寄包裹有如下规定：若包裹的重量超过30千克,不予邮寄，对可以邮寄的包裹每件收手续费0.2元，再加上根据下表按重量wei计算的结果：<br />
&nbsp; &nbsp;<br />
重量(千克)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 收费标准(元/公斤)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
wei&lt;=10 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;0.80&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
10&lt;wei&lt;=20 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;0.75&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
20&lt;wei&lt;=30 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;0.70&nbsp;<br />
请你编写一个程序，输入包裹重量，输出所需费用或&rdquo;Fail&rdquo;表示无法邮寄。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个正整数，表示邮寄包裹的重量。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应的费用(答案保留2位小数)或&ldquo;Fail&rdquo;表示无法邮寄。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>7</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>5.80</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.2.2</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1010' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1010?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1010. \u90ae\u5bc4\u5305\u88f9 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1011. 正方形 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1011" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">有一个正方形，四个角的坐标分别是（1，-1），（1，1），（-1，-1），（-1，1）。写一个程序，判断一个给定的点（x,y）是否在这个正方形内（包括正方形边界），如果在正方形内输出&ldquo;Yes&rdquo;，否则输出&ldquo;No&rdquo;。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行两个空格隔开的实数x,y，表示点的坐标。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">如果点(x,y)在正方形内输出&ldquo;Yes&rdquo;，否则输出&ldquo;No&rdquo;。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>0 0</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>Yes</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.2.3</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1011' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1011?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1011. \u6b63\u65b9\u5f62 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1012. 变换密码 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1012" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">一密码变换规则如下：一个正整数对应一个字符；如果该数模123的值在97-122范围，变换为ASCII为该余数对应的小写字符；如果变换不了小写字符，将该数模91，若余数在65-90范围，变换为ASCII为该余数对应的大写字符；如果变换不了大小写字符，变换为&ldquo;*&rdquo;。输入一个正整数，输出变换后的字符。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个正整数n(1&lt;=n&lt;=1000)表示原始密码。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出变换后的密码。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>42</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>*</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=n&lt;=1000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.2.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1012' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1012?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1012. \u53d8\u6362\u5bc6\u7801 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1013. 识别三角形 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1013" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入三个正整数，判断能否构成三角形的三边，如果不能，输出&ldquo;NO&rdquo;。如果能构成三角形，判断构成什么三角形？按等边、直角、一般三角形分类，依次输出对应的三角形类型&ldquo;Equilateral&rdquo;、&ldquo;Right&rdquo;、&ldquo;General&rdquo;。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一行三个用空格隔开的正整数a,b,c，表示三角形的三条边长。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应三角形的类型，如果不能构成三角形，输出&ldquo;NO&rdquo;，如果是等边三角形输出&ldquo;Equilateral&rdquo;，如果是直角三角形输出&ldquo;Right&rdquo;，其他三角形则输出&ldquo;General&rdquo;。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 4 5</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>Right</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=a,b,c&lt;=1000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.3.2</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1013' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1013?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1013. \u8bc6\u522b\u4e09\u89d2\u5f62 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1014. 写评语 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1014" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入某学生成绩score，根据成绩好坏输出相应评语。如果成绩在大于等于90，输出&ldquo;Excellent&rdquo;；如果成绩在大于等于80分且小于90分，输出&ldquo;Good&rdquo;；如果成绩大于等于60分且小于80分，输出&ldquo;Pass&rdquo;；成绩小于60分，输出&ldquo;Fail&rdquo;。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个整数score，表示学生的成绩</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应的评语。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>65</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>Pass</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">0&lt;=score&lt;=100</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.3.3</p>

					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1014' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1014?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1014. \u5199\u8bc4\u8bed (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->

				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入数字1~7的表示星期一至星期日，输出对应的星期几的英文名称。<br />
如果是1，输出Monday;<br />
如果是2，输出Tuesday;<br />
如果是3，输出Wednesday;<br />
如果是4，输出Thursday;<br />
如果是5，输出Friday;<br />
如果是6，输出Saturday;<br />
如果是7，输出Sunday;</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1015' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1015?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1015. \u661f\u671f\u51e0 (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1016. 计算天数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1016" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入年份与月份，求该月共有多少天。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入两个空格隔开的正整数year和month，分别表示年份和月份</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应year这一年month这个月的天数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2000 2</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>29</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1000&lt;=year&lt;=3000,1&lt;=month&lt;=12</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.4.3</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1016' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1016?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1016. \u8ba1\u7b97\u5929\u6570 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1017. 价格查询 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1017" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">编程实现以下功能：查询水果的单价。有4种水果，苹果(apples)、梨(pears)、桔子(oranges)和葡萄(grapes)，单价分别是3.00元/公斤，2.50元/公斤，4.10元/公斤和10.20元/公斤。<br />
运行程序后，首先在屏幕上显示以下菜单(编号和选项)（见样例）。<br />
当用户输入编号1～4，显示相应水果的单价(保留1位小数)；输入0，退出查询；输入其他编号，显示价格为0。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个整数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出对应的结果。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>[1] apples
[2] pears
[3] oranges
[4] grapes
[0] Exit
price=4.1</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.4.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1017' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1017?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1017. \u4ef7\u683c\u67e5\u8be2 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1018. 打电话 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1018" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>

	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">某市的IC卡电话计费标准如下：首次为0.5元/3分钟(不足3分钟按3分钟计费)，之后是0.2元/1分钟，不足一分钟按一分钟来算，如一个人打了6分30秒，那计费是按照7分钟来算，花费为1.3元。已知某人打一次电话花费为x元，问这个人有可能打了多长时间的电话？（精确到分钟）</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个实数x，表示打电话的花费。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出打电话的最长时长(精确到分钟)。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>0.5</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">0&lt;x&lt;=100</div>
			</fieldset></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1018' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1018?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1018. \u6253\u7535\u8bdd (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1019. 分段函数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1019" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">编写程序，计算下列分段函数y=f(x)的值（输入数据为浮点数，输出保留小数点后三位）。<br />
<img src="http://latex.codecogs.com/gif.latex?f%28x%29%3D%5Cleft%5C%7B%5Cbegin%7Bmatrix%7D%20x&amp;plus;2.5%20%26%200%3C%3Dx%3C5%5C%5C%202-1.5%28x-3%29%28x-3%29%26%205%3C%3Dx%3C10%20%5C%5C%20x/2-1.5%20%26%2010%3C%3Dx%3C20%20%5Cend%7Bmatrix%7D%5Cright." alt=" " /></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入x。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出f(x)的值，答案保留三位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3.500</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">0&lt;=x&lt;20</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1019' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1019?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1019. \u5206\u6bb5\u51fd\u6570 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1020. 数字识别 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1020" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入一个不多于四位的正整数，求出它是几位数，并分别打印出各位上的数字。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个不多于四位的正整数x。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行输出x的位数num，接下来num行从高位到低位输出x的每一位上的数字。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>123</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3
1
2
3</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=x&lt;=9999</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1020' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1020?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1020. \u6570\u5b57\u8bc6\u522b (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1021. 发放奖金 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1021" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">企业发放的奖金根据利润分段计算提成。当利润I低于或等于10万元的，奖金可提10%；利润高于10万元，低于20万元，低于10万元的部分按10%提成，高于10万元的部分，可提成7.5%；20万到40万的，低于20万的部分仍按上述办法提成（下同）。高于20万元的部分按5%提成；40万到60万时，高于40万的部分按3%提成；60万到100万时，高于60万的部分按1.5%提成；I&gt;=100万元时，超过100万元的部分按1%提成。输入当月利润I，求应发奖金总数(单位为元)？（输出保留小数点后三位）</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入实数I，表示利润。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出奖金数，答案保留三位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>100000</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>10000.000</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">0&lt;I&lt;=1,000,000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习3.5.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1021' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1021?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1021. \u53d1\u653e\u5956\u91d1 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->

		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">神龙数码公司设计了一个加密算法：用a代替z,用b代替y，用c代替x,......，用z代替a。现要求输入一个小写字母，对其进行加密输出。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>

				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出加密后的字符。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>

				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>z</pre></div>

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">
			<a class="btn" data-dismiss="modal">Close</a>
			<a class="btn btn-success" id="btn_upload">Upload</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1000' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1000?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1000. \u52a0\u5bc6\u7b97\u6cd5 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1023. 最大跨度 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1023" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给定一个长度为n的非负整数序列，请计算序列的最大跨度值（最大跨度值 = 最大值减去最小值）。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一共两行，第1行为序列的个数n（1&le;n&le;1000)，第2行为序列的n个不超过1000的非负整数，整数之间以一个空格分隔。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出最大跨度值。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>6
3 0 8 7 5 9</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>9</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&le;n&le;1000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习4.1.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1023' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1023?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1023. \u6700\u5927\u8de8\u5ea6 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1024. 因子个数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1024" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">对于任意给定的一个正整数，计算其因数个数。<br />
输入样例：<br />
6<br />
输出样例：<br />
4<br />
说明：<br />
1、2、3、6都是6的因数。因此，输出4。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入正整数N。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出N的因子个数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>6</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>4</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=N&lt;2^31</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
							<div class="well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>提示</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">1、2、3、6都是6的因数。因此，输出4。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
			<div style="text-align:center">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1024' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1024?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1024. \u56e0\u5b50\u4e2a\u6570 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1025. 统计奖牌 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1025" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">2008年北京奥运会，A国的运动员参与了n天的决赛项目(1&le;n&le;17)。现在要统计一下A国所获得的金、银、铜牌数目及总奖牌数。<br />
&nbsp;</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入n＋1行，第1行是A国参与决赛项目的天数n，其后n行，每一行是该国某一天获得的金、银、铜牌数目，以一个空格分开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出仅1行，包括4个整数，为A国所获得的金、银、铜牌总数及总奖牌数，以一个空格分开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3
1 0 3
3 1 0
0 3 0</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>&nbsp;4 4 3 11</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习4.1.7</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="modal hide fade" id="modal_upload">
		<div class="modal-header">

			<h3>Upload Solution</h3>
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>
		
		<div class="modal-footer">
