KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1050. 矩阵乘法 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1050" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">计算两个矩阵的乘法。n*m阶的矩阵A乘以m*k阶的矩阵B得到的矩阵C 是n*k阶的，且C[i][j] = A[i][0]*B[0][j] + A[i][1]*B[1][j] + &hellip;&hellip; +A[i][m-1]*B[m-1][j](C[i][j]表示C矩阵中第i行第j列元素)。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行为n, m, k，表示A矩阵是n行m列，B矩阵是m行k列，n, m, k均小于100；然后先后输入A和B两个矩阵，A矩阵n行m列，B矩阵m行k列，矩阵中每个元素的绝对值不会大于100。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出矩阵C，一共n行，每行k个整数，整数之间以一个空格分开。<br />
分析：由定义可得：C[i][j] = A[i][0]*B[0][j] + A[i][1]*B[1][j] + &hellip;&hellip; +A[i][m-1]*B[m-1][j](C[i][j]，因此每次计算C[i][j]时可以枚举k=0~m-1，计算的和。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2 3 2
1 2 3
2 1 4
1 2
2 1
3 2</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>14 10
16 13</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.5.8</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1050' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1050?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1050. \u77e9\u9635\u4e58\u6cd5 (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1051. 合影 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1051" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">小云和朋友们去爬香山，为美丽的景色所陶醉，想合影留念。如果他们站成一排，男生全部在左（从拍照者的角度），并按照从矮到高的顺序从左到右排，女生全部在右，并按照从高到矮的顺序从左到右排，请问他们合影的效果是什么样的（所有人的身高都不同）？</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行是人数n（2 &lt;= n &lt;= 40，且至少有1个男生和1个女生）。<br />
后面紧跟n行，每行输入一个人的性别（男male或女female）和身高（浮点数，单位米），两个数据之间以空格分隔。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">n个浮点数，模拟站好队后，拍照者眼中从左到右每个人的身高。每个浮点数需保留到小数点后2位，相邻两个数之间用单个空格隔开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>6
male 1.72
male 1.78
female 1.61
male 1.65
female 1.70
female 1.56</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1.65 1.72 1.78 1.70 1.61 1.56</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>

		});

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1052. Self-Numbers <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1052" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">在1949年印度数学家D. R. Daprekar发现了一类称作Self-Numbers的数。对于每一个正整数n，我们定义d(n)为n加上它每一位数字的和。例如，d(75)=75+7+5=87。给定任意正整数n作为一个起点，都能构造出一个无限递增的序列：n, d(n), d(d(n)), d(d(d(n))), . . . 例如，如果你从33开始，下一个数是33+3+3=39，再下一个为39+3+9=51，再再下一个为51+5+1=57，因此你所产生的序列就像这样：33, 39, 51, 57, 69, 84, 96, 111, 114, 120, 123, 129, 141, . . . 数字n被称作d(n)的发生器。在上面的这个序列中，33是39的发生器，39是51的发生器，51是57的发生器等等。有一些数有超过一个发生器，如101的发生器可以使91和100。一个没有发生器的数被称作Self-Number。如前13个Self-Number为1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 20, 31, 42, 53, 64, 75, 86, 97。我们将第i个Self-Number表示为a[i]，所以a[1]=1, a[2]=3, a[3]=5. . .&nbsp;</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入包含整数N、K、s1. . . sk，其中1&lt;=N&lt;=10^7，1&lt;=K&lt;=5000，以空格和换行分割。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">在第一行你需要输出一个数，这个数表示在闭区间[1, N]中Self-Number的数量。第二行必须包含以空格划分的K个数，表示a[s1]. . a[sk]，这里保证所有的a[s1]. . a[sk]都小于N。（例如，如果N=100，sk可以为1-13，但不能为14，因为a[14]=108&gt;100）&nbsp;</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>100 10
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 11 12 13&nbsp;</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>13
1 3 5 7 9 20 31 75 86 97</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=N&lt;=10^7，1&lt;=K&lt;=5000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.2</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1052' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1052?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1052. Self-Numbers (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1053. 相似度 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1053" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给出两幅相同大小的黑白图像（用0-1矩阵）表示，求它们的相似度。<br />
说明：若两幅图像在相同位置上的像素点颜色相同，则称它们在该位置具有相同的像素点。两幅图像的相似度定义为相同像素点数占总像素点数的百分比。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行包含两个整数m和n，表示图像的行数和列数，中间用单个空格隔开。1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100。<br />
之后m行，每行n个整数0或1，表示第一幅黑白图像上各像素点的颜色。相邻两个数之间用单个空格隔开。<br />
之后m行，每行n个整数0或1，表示第二幅黑白图像上各像素点的颜色。相邻两个数之间用单个空格隔开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一个实数，表示相似度（以百分比的形式给出），精确到小数点后两位。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 3
1 0 1
0 0 1
1 1 0
1 1 0
0 0 1
0 0 1</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>44.44</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.3</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1054. 扫雷游戏 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1054" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">扫雷游戏是一款十分经典的单机小游戏。它的精髓在于，通过已翻开格子所提示的周围格地雷数，来判断未翻开格子里是否是地雷。<br />
现在给出n行m列的雷区中的地雷分布，要求计算出每个非地雷格的周围格地雷数。<br />
注：每个格子周围格有八个：上、下、左、右、左上、右上、左下、右下。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行包含两个整数n和m，分别表示雷区的行数和列数。1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100。<br />
接下来n行，每行m个字符，&lsquo;*&rsquo;表示相应格子中是地雷，&lsquo;？&rsquo;表示相应格子中无地雷。字符之间无任何分隔符。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">n行，每行m个字符，描述整个雷区。若相应格中是地雷，则用&lsquo;*&rsquo;表示，否则用相应的周围格地雷数表示。字符之间无任何分隔符。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 3
*??
???
?*?</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>*10
221
1*1</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div id="sidebar" class="span2">
		<div class="well" id="div_statistics"><fieldset><legend><h5><em>统计</em></h5></legend>通过: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1054"><span class="badge badge-info">606</span></a><br />提交: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1054"><span class="badge badge-info">1246</span></a><br />平均分: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1054"><span class="badge badge-info">57.39</span></a><br /><div style="text-align:center"><button class=" btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='#main/submit/1054'">提交</button></div></section></fieldset></div>
		
					<div class="well" id="div_tags"><fieldset id="tags">
				<legend><h5>
					<em>标签</em>
									</h5></legend>
				<div id="tags_ajax"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
				<div class="well" id="div_solutions">
			<fieldset id="solutions">
				<legend><h5><em>题解</em>
					<button id="add_solution_btn" class="btn btn-mini pull-right" onclick="add_solution()">添加</button>
				</h5></legend>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1054' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1054?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1054. \u626b\u96f7\u6e38\u620f (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1055. 走廊 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1055" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">有一个M行N列的教室座位中，有D对同学总爱凑在一起讲话。现老师要用走廊隔开他们。但只能在行之间加入K条走廊，在列中加入L条走廊，问加在哪里能使效果最佳。（一对爱讲话的同学只有左右相邻或上下相邻）。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行，有5各用空格隔开的整数，分别是M，N，K，L，D（2&lt;=N，M&lt;=1000，0&lt;=K&lt;M，0&lt;=L&lt;N，D&lt;=2000）。接下来D行，每行有4个用空格隔开的整数，第i行的4个整数Xi，Yi，Pi，Qi，表示坐在位置(Xi,Yi)与(Pi,Qi)的两个同学会交头接耳（输入保证他们前后相邻或者左右相邻）。输入数据保证最优方案的唯一性。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">共两行。第一行包含K个整数，a1a2&hellip;&hellip;aK，表示第a1行和a1+1行之间、第a2行和第a2+1行之间、&hellip;、第aK行和第aK+1行之间要开辟通道，其中ai&lt; ai+1，每两个整数之间用空格隔开（行尾没有空格）。第二行包含L个整数，b1b2&hellip;&hellip;bk，表示第b1列和b1+1列之间、第b2列和第b2+1列之间、&hellip;、第bL列和第bL+1列之间要开辟通道，其中bi&lt; bi+1，每两个整数之间用空格隔开（行尾没有空格）。若有多组答案，输出字典序最小的一组。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>4 5 1 2 3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
4 2 4 3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2 3 3 3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2 5 2 4</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2 4</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.5</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>

						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目

					</p>

		</div>
	</div>

	}

		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1055' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1056. 表达式 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1056" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">表达式6&times;9=42对于十进制来说是错误的，但是对于十三进制来说是正确的。即6(13)&times;9(13)=42(13)，而42(13)=4&times;131+2&times;130=54(10)。你的任务是写一段程序读入3个整数p、q和r，然后确定一个进制B(2&le;B&le;16)使得p&times;q=r。如果B有很多选择，输出最小的一个。例如：p=11,q=11,r=121。则有11(3) &times;11(3)=121(3)，11(10) &times;11(10)=121(10)。这种情况下，输出3。如果没有合适的进制，则输出0。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行，3个B进制的正整数p、q、r（数位&le;7）。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">使得p&times;q=r成立的最小进制B，如果没有合适的进制，则输出0。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>6 9 42</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>13</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.6</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div id="sidebar" class="span2">
		<div class="well" id="div_statistics"><fieldset><legend><h5><em>统计</em></h5></legend>通过: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1056"><span class="badge badge-info">310</span></a><br />提交: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1056"><span class="badge badge-info">581</span></a><br />平均分: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1056"><span class="badge badge-info">73.55</span></a><br /><div style="text-align:center"><button class=" btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='#main/submit/1056'">提交</button></div></section></fieldset></div>
		
					<div class="well" id="div_tags"><fieldset id="tags">
				<legend><h5>
					<em>标签</em>
									</h5></legend>
				<div id="tags_ajax"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
				<div class="well" id="div_solutions">

				<legend><h5><em>题解</em>
					<button id="add_solution_btn" class="btn btn-mini pull-right" onclick="add_solution()">添加</button>
				</h5></legend>
				
				<div><a class='solution' href='index.php/main/download/1056/QQ%2520366577294.txt/0/solution_path' data-toggle='tooltip' title='By puol''>QQ 366577294.txt</a><br /><a class='solution' href='index.php/main/download/1056/%25E8%25A1%25A8%25E8%25BE%25BE%25E5%25BC%258F%2528%25E5%258D%25B3%25E7%25A1%25AE%25E5%25AE%259A%25E8%25BF%259B%25E5%2588%25B6%25EF%25BC%2589.cpp/0/solution_path' data-toggle='tooltip' title='By 王书恒'>表达式(即确定进制）.cpp</a><br /><a class='solution' href='index.php/main/download/1056/ssj.pas/0/solution_path' data-toggle='tooltip' title='By shenshijun0110'>ssj.pas</a><br /><a class='solution' href='index.php/main/download/1056/1056%25E8%25BF%2599%25E6%25AC%25A1%25E4%25B8%258D%25E5%25A4%259A%25E8%25AF%25B4%25E4%25BB%2580%25E4%25B9%2588%25E4%25BA%2586.txt/0/solution_path' data-toggle='tooltip' title='By LoveAurora'>1056这次不多说什么了.txt</a><br /></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1056' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1056?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1056. \u8868\u8fbe\u5f0f (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1057. 石头剪刀布 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1057" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">Bart的妹妹Lisa在一个二维矩阵上创造了新的文明。矩阵上每个位置被三种生命形式之一占据：石头，剪刀，布。每天，上下左右相邻的不同生命形式将会发生战斗。在战斗中，石头永远胜剪刀，剪刀永远胜布，布永远胜石头。每一天结束之后，败者的领地将被胜者占领。<br />
你的工作是计算出n天之后矩阵的占据情况。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行包含三个正整数r，c，n，分别表示矩阵的行数、列数以及天数。每个整数均不超过100。<br />
接下来r行，每行c个字符，描述矩阵初始时被占据的情况。每个位置上的字符只能是R，S，P三者之一，分别代表石头，剪刀，布。相邻字符之间无空格。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出n天之后的矩阵占据情况。每个位置上的字符只能是R，S，P三者之一，相邻字符之间无空格。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 3 1
RRR
RSR
RRR</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>RRR
RRR
RRR</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.6.7</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1057' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1057?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1057. \u77f3\u5934\u526a\u5200\u5e03 (Standard IO)";
</script>

	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1059. 表达式求值 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1059" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>

			</fieldset></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1059' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1059?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1059. \u8868\u8fbe\u5f0f\u6c42\u503c (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1060. 雷同检测 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1060" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>

			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">考试的时候老师最讨厌有人抄袭了。自从有了电子评卷，老师要查找雷同卷，就容易多了，只要将两个人的答案输入计算机，进行逐个字符的比对，把相同的位置都找出来，就一目了然了。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>

				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">1行，包含若干个以空格分隔的数字，表示出现相同字符的位置</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1060' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1060?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1060. \u96f7\u540c\u68c0\u6d4b (Standard IO)";
</script>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1061. Wifi密码 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1061" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">使用Wifi上网时，通常需要输入正确的密码之后，才能登录。假设输入密码没有次数限制（密码通常为八个字符，假设预置密码为NOIP@CCF）。<br />
请你编写一个程序，模拟使用Wifi上网的登录过程：用户尝试输入密码，直到自己要求结束或者密码正确。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入包含若干行尝试登录信息，每一次尝试对应两行或一行输入：<br />
第一行，一个字符&quot;Y&quot;或&quot;N &quot;，表示是否继续登录<br />
第一行为&quot;Y&quot;时，则还需要输入第二行，八位字符，表示要尝试的密码</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出仅一行：密码是否正确的提示信息&quot;Success&quot;或&quot;Sorry&quot;</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>输入1：
Y
cctv@CCF
Y
NOIP@CCF
输入2：
Y
cctv@CCF
N</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>输出1：
Sorry
Success
输出2：
Sorry</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习5.4.7</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div id="sidebar" class="span2">
		<div class="well" id="div_statistics"><fieldset><legend><h5><em>统计</em></h5></legend>通过: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1061"><span class="badge badge-info">686</span></a><br />提交: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1061"><span class="badge badge-info">1488</span></a><br />平均分: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1061"><span class="badge badge-info">55.91</span></a><br /><div style="text-align:center"><button class=" btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='#main/submit/1061'">提交</button></div></section></fieldset></div>
		
					<div class="well" id="div_tags"><fieldset id="tags">
				<legend><h5>
					<em>标签</em>
									</h5></legend>
				<div id="tags_ajax"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
				<div class="well" id="div_solutions">

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1061' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1061?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1061. Wifi\u5bc6\u7801 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给出平面上两个点的坐标(x1,y1),(x2,y2)，求两点之间的曼哈顿距离。曼哈顿距离=|x1-x2|+|y1-y2|。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行四个空格隔开的实数，分别表示x1,y1,x2,y2。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出一个实数表示曼哈顿距离，保留三位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>输出一个实数表示曼哈顿距离，保留三位小数。</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3.600</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">-10000&lt;=x1,y1,x2,y2&lt;=10000</div>
			</fieldset></div>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1064. 计算斐波那契第n项 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1064" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">输入n，编写程序输出斐波那契数列的第n项。其中斐波那契数列f(n)的定义如下：<br />
f(1)=0,f(2)=1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />
f(n)=f(n-1)+f(n-2)(n&gt;=2)</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行一个正整数n。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">&nbsp;输出一个数f(n)。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>5</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=n&lt;=30</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.3</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1064' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1064?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1064. \u8ba1\u7b97\u6590\u6ce2\u90a3\u5951\u7b2cn\u9879 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1003. 猜数游戏 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1003" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">有一个&ldquo;就是它&rdquo;的猜数游戏，步骤如下：请你对任意输入的一个三位数x，在这三位数后重复一遍，得到一个六位数，467--&gt;467467.把这个数连续除以7、11、13，输出最后的商。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入一个三位数x。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出最后的商。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>100</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>100</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">100&lt;=x&lt;=999</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计入门篇练习2.4.3</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1003' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1003?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1003. \u731c\u6570\u6e38\u620f (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1067. 最匹配的矩阵 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1067" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给定一个m*n的矩阵A和r*s的矩阵B,其中0&lt;r&lt;=m,0&lt;s&lt;=n，A、B所有元素值都是小于100的正整数。求A中一个大小为r*s的子矩阵C，使得B和C的对应元素差值的绝对值之和最小，这时称C为最匹配的矩阵。如果有多个子矩阵同时满足条件，选择子矩阵左上角元素行号小者，行号相同时，选择列号小者。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">&nbsp;第一行是m和n，以一个空格分开。<br />
之后m行每行有n个整数，表示A矩阵中的各行，数与数之间以一个空格分开。<br />
第m+2行为r和s，以一个空格分开。<br />
之后r行每行有s个整数，表示B矩阵中的各行，数与数之间以一个空格分开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出矩阵C，一共r行，每行s个整数，整数之间以一个空格分开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3 3
3 4 5
5 3 4
8 2 4
2 2
7 3
4 9</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>4 5
3 4</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=m&lt;=100,1&lt;=n&lt;=100</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.7</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div id="sidebar" class="span2">
		<div class="well" id="div_statistics"><fieldset><legend><h5><em>统计</em></h5></legend>通过: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1067"><span class="badge badge-info">277</span></a><br />提交: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1067"><span class="badge badge-info">400</span></a><br />平均分: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1067"><span class="badge badge-info">72.85</span></a><br /><div style="text-align:center"><button class=" btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='#main/submit/1067'">提交</button></div></section></fieldset></div>
		
					<div class="well" id="div_tags"><fieldset id="tags">
				<legend><h5>
					<em>标签</em>

				<div id="tags_ajax"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
				<div class="well" id="div_solutions">
			<fieldset id="solutions">
				<legend><h5><em>题解</em>
					<button id="add_solution_btn" class="btn btn-mini pull-right" onclick="add_solution()">添加</button>
				</h5></legend>

			</fieldset>
		</div>
		
					<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h5><em>来源/作者</em></h5></legend>
				<div class="content">CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.7</div>
			</fieldset></div>

</div>

	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {

			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});

			$('#trigger').popover('hide')

			load_tags(false);

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给定m行n列的图像各像素点灰度值，对其依次进行一系列操作后，求最终图像。<br />
其中，可能的操作有如下四种：<br />
A：顺时针旋转90度；<br />
B：逆时针旋转90度；<br />
C：左右翻转；<br />
D：上下翻转。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行包含两个正整数m和n，表示图像的行数和列数，中间用单个空格隔开。1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100。<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 接下来m行，每行n个整数，表示图像中每个像素点的灰度值，相邻两个数之间用单个空格隔开。灰度值范围在0到255之间。<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 接下来一行，包含由A、B、C、D组成的字符串s，表示需要按顺序执行的操作序列。s的长度在1到100之间。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">m'行，每行包含n'个整数，为最终图像各像素点的灰度值。其中m'为最终图像的行数，n'为最终图像的列数。相邻两个整数之间用单个空格隔开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2 3
10 0 10
100 100 10
AC</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>10 100
0 100
10 10</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1 &lt;= m &lt;= 100, 1 &lt;= n &lt;= 100。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.8</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

			</fieldset></div>

					<button id="add_solution_btn" class="btn btn-mini pull-right" onclick="add_solution()">添加</button>
				</h5></legend>

			</fieldset>
		</div>
		
					<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h5><em>来源/作者</em></h5></legend>
				<div class="content">CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.8</div>
			</fieldset></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1068' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1068?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1068. \u56fe\u50cf\u65cb\u8f6c\u7ffb\u8f6c\u53d8\u6362 (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1069. 分解因数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1069" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">给出一个正整数a,要求分解成若干个正整数的乘积，即a=a1*a2*a3*...*an，并且1&lt;a1&lt;=a2&lt;=a3&lt;=...&lt;=an，问这样的分解方案有多少种。注意a=a也是一种分解。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行是测试数据的组数n，后面n行，每行包括一个正整数a(1&lt;a&lt;32768)。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">N行，每行输出一个个正整数，表示分解方案数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2
2
20</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1
4</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;a&lt;32768</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1070. 汉诺塔游戏 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">3000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1070" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">汉诺塔由编号为1到n大小不同的圆盘和三根柱子a,b,c组成，编号越小盘子越小。开始时，这n个圆盘由大到小依次套在a柱上，如图1.6.3所示。要求把a柱上n个圆盘按下述规则移到c柱上：<br />
①一次只能移一个圆盘，它必须位于某个柱子的顶部；<br />
②圆盘只能在三个柱子上存放；<br />
③任何时刻不允许大盘压小盘。<br />
将这n个盘子用最少移动次数从a柱移动到c柱上，输出每一步的移动方法。<br />
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=" " /><br />
&nbsp;</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">只有一行，一个整数n(1&lt;=n&lt;=20),表示盘子的数量。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输出若干行，每一行的格式是&ldquo;步数.Move 盘子编号 from 源柱 to 目标柱&rdquo;。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1.Move 1 from a to c
2.Move 2 from a to b
3.Move 1 from c to b
4.Move 3 from a to c
5.Move 1 from b to a
6.Move 2 from b to c
7.Move 1 from a to c</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=n&lt;=20</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇例1.12</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	
	<div id="sidebar" class="span2">
		<div class="well" id="div_statistics"><fieldset><legend><h5><em>统计</em></h5></legend>通过: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1070"><span class="badge badge-info">426</span></a><br />提交: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1070"><span class="badge badge-info">726</span></a><br />平均分: <a class="pull-right" href="#main/statistic/1070"><span class="badge badge-info">52.58</span></a><br /><div style="text-align:center"><button class=" btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='#main/submit/1070'">提交</button></div></section></fieldset></div>
		
					<div class="well" id="div_tags"><fieldset id="tags">
				<legend><h5>
					<em>标签</em>
									</h5></legend>
				<div id="tags_ajax"></div>
			</fieldset></div>
				<div class="well" id="div_solutions">
			<fieldset id="solutions">
				<legend><h5><em>题解</em>
					<button id="add_solution_btn" class="btn btn-mini pull-right" onclick="add_solution()">添加</button>
				</h5></legend>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1070' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1070?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1070. \u6c49\u8bfa\u5854\u6e38\u620f (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1071. Pell数列 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1071" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">Pell数列a1，a2，a3...的定义是这样的：a1=1,a2=2, ... ,an=2*an-1+an-2&nbsp; (n&gt;2)。给出一个正整数k，要求Pell数列的第k项模上32767是多少。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第1行是测试数据的组数n，后面跟着n行输入。每组测试数据占1行，包括一个正整数k (1&lt;=k&lt;1000000)。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">n行，每行输出对应一个输入。输出应是一个非负整数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2
1
8</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1
408</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=n&lt;=10,1&lt;=k&lt;1000000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇练习1.2</p>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1072. 爬楼梯 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1072" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">树老师爬楼梯，他可以每次走1级或者2级，输入楼梯的级数，求不同的走法数。例如：<br />
楼梯一共有3级，他可以每次都走一级，或者第一次走一级，第二次走两级，也可以第一次走两级，第二次走一级，一共3种方法。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">输入包含若干行，每行包含一个正整数N(1&lt;=N&lt;=30)，代表楼梯级数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">不同的走法数，每一行输入对应一行输出。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>5
8
10</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>8
34
89</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">1&lt;=N&lt;=30</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇练习1.3</p>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1073. 放苹果 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1073" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">把M个同样的苹果放在N个同样的盘子里，允许有的盘子空着不放，问共有多少种不同的放法（放法数用K表示）。如在7个苹果3个盘子的情况下, 5，1，1和1，5，1 是同一种放法。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">第一行是测试数据的数目t（0&lt;=t&lt;= 20）。以下每行均包含二个整数M和N(1&lt;=M，N&lt;=10)，以空格分开。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">对输入的每组数据M和N，用一行输出相应的K。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>1
7 3</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>8</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">0&lt;=t&lt;= 20, 1&lt;=M，N&lt;=10</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇练习1.4</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1073' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1073?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1073. \u653e\u82f9\u679c (Standard IO)";
</script>

<!-- End of file show.php -->
KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1074. 2的幂次方表示 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1074" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">任何一个正整数都可以用2的幂次方表示。例如：137=27+23+20。同时约定方次用括号来表示，即ab可表示为a(b)。由此可知，137可表示为：2(7)+2(3)+2(0)。<br />
进一步：7=22+2+20（21用2表示），3=2+20<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 所以最后137可表示为：2(2(2)+2+2(0))+2(2+2(0))+2(0)<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 又如：1315=210+28+25+2+1<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 所以1315最后可表示为：2(2(2+2(0))+2)+2(2(2+2(0)))+2(2(2)+2(0))+2+2(0)</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一个正整数n（n&lt;=20000）。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行，符合约定的n的2的幂次方表示（在表示中不能有空格）。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>137</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>2(2(2)+2+2(0))+2(2+2(0))+2(0)</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
		
			<div class="well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">n&lt;=20000</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			
			<div style="text-align:center">
									<p>来源/作者: CCF中学生计算机程序设计基础篇练习1.5</p>
													<p id="problem-copyright"></p>
					<script> $("#problem-copyright").load("static/copyright/admin/footnote.html"); </script>
					<p>
						<a href="#main/problemset?admin_only=1" style="text-decoration:underline">
							所有管理员添加的题目
						</a>使用此版权/授权形式
					</p>
							</div>
		</div>
	</div>

KSDLSADEVEFMNVV<div class="row-fluid">
	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1075. F函数 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1075" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
</div>

<div class="row-fluid" style="margin-top:7px">
	<div id="mainbar" class="span10">
		<div class="problem">
			<div class="span12 well"><fieldset>
				<legend><h4>题目描述</h4></legend>
				<div class="content">已知 f(x,n)=<img src="http://latex.codecogs.com/gif.latex?%u5DF2%u77E5f%28x%2Cn%29%3D%5Csqrt%7Bn&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-1&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B...&amp;plus;2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B1&amp;plus;x%7D%7D%7D%7D%7D%uFF0C%u8F93%u5165x%u548Cn%u7684%u503C%uFF0C%u8BA1%u7B97f%28x%2Cn%29%u7684%u503C%u3002" alt=" " /><img src="http://latex.codecogs.com/gif.latex?%u5DF2%u77E5f%28x%2Cn%29%3D%5Csqrt%7Bn&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-1&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B...&amp;plus;2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B1&amp;plus;x%7D%7D%7D%7D%7D%uFF0C%u8F93%u5165x%u548Cn%u7684%u503C%uFF0C%u8BA1%u7B97f%28x%2Cn%29%u7684%u503C%u3002" alt=" " /><img src="http://latex.codecogs.com/gif.latex?%5Csqrt%7Bn&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-1&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7Bn-2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B...&amp;plus;2&amp;plus;%5Csqrt%7B1&amp;plus;x%7D%7D%7D%7D%7D" alt=" " />，&nbsp;输入x和n的值,计算f(x,n)的值。</div>
			</fieldset></div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">一行两个数x和n，其中x是实数，n是整数。1&lt;=x,n&lt;=20。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content">&nbsp;输出f(x,n)的值，答案保留两位小数。</div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>
			
			<div>
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输入</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>4.2 10</pre></div> <!-- no br needed in pre -->
				</fieldset></div>
			
				<div class="span6 well"><fieldset>
					<legend><h4>样例输出</h4></legend>
					<div class="content"><pre style='border:none;font-size:110%'>3.68</pre></div>
				</fieldset></div>
			</div>
			<div class="clearfix"></div>

				<legend><h4>数据范围限制</h4></legend>

			</fieldset></div>

		<div class="modal-body">
			<span></span>
			<input type="file" name="solution" />
		</div>

			<a class="btn" data-dismiss="modal">Close</a>

		</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	function add_solution(){
		$('#modal_upload').modal({backdrop: 'static'});
	}
	
	function delete_solution(idSolution) {
		access_page('main/deletesolution/' + idSolution);
	}

	function load_tags(readonly) {
		$.get('index.php/main/tags/1075' + (readonly ? '?readonly=true' : ''), function(data) {
			$("#tags_ajax").html(data);
		});
	}
	var editing_tags; // global variables. because 'tags' will refresh the entire page
	load_tags(! editing_tags);
	if (editing_tags) $("#add_tag_btn").hide(); else $("#cancel_add").hide();

	$.get('index.php/main/limits/1075?simple', function(data) {
		data = '<pre>'+data+'</pre>';
		$('#trigger').popover({html: true, content: data, trigger: 'hover', placement: 'bottom'});
	});
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		$('.solution').tooltip();
		$('#modal_upload #btn_upload').click(function(){
			$('#modal_upload').modal('hide');
			$('#form_solution_upload').ajaxSubmit({
				type: 'post',
				success: function(responseText, stautsText){
					if (responseText == 'success') refresh_page();
					else alert("Failed to upload!");
				}
			});
		});
		$('#trigger').click(function(){
			$('#trigger').popover('hide')
		});
		$('#add_tag_btn').click(function(){
			load_tags(false);
			$("#add_tag_btn").hide();
			$("#cancel_add").show();
			editing_tags = true;
		});
		$('#cancel_add').click(function(){
			load_tags(true);
			$("#cancel_add").hide();
			$("#add_tag_btn").show();
			editing_tags = false;
		});
	});

	document.title = "1075. F\u51fd\u6570 (Standard IO)";
</script>

	<div id="header"><div style="text-align:center"><h2>1077. 自然数的拆分问题 <sub>(Standard IO)</sub></h2><div>时间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">1000 ms</span> &nbsp;空间限制: <span class="badge badge-info">262144 KB</span> &nbsp;具体限制&nbsp; <a href="#main/limits/1077" style="text-align:left"><span id="trigger"><i class="icon-chevron-down"></i></span></a></div></div></div>
